testcase.name: validating flight booking
testcase.system-out: Given initialize application on the chrome browser..........................passed When user enter the Valid information on Departure "Paris" to Destination "Rome".passed And click find flights......................................................passed And click the selective flights.............................................passed And enter the name "Satish" address "Walajapet" city "Vellore" state "Tamilnadu" zip Code "632513" card Type "American Express" credit Card Number "56456" month "11" year "2022" name on Card "Satish Kumar".passed Then validate the purchase flight...........................................passed
